articles.title: These Canadians are unfazed by new drink guidelines
articles.description: New guidance in Canada says no alcohol is best and two drinks maximum each week is deemed low-risk.
articles.content:
New national recommendations in Canada that say abstaining from alcohol is the only risk-free approach.
But if a person chooses to consume, two drinks maximum each week is deemed low-risk by the gov… [+217 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: New Zealand PM Ardern to step down next month
articles.description: 'I no longer have enough in the tank' - an emotional Jacinda Ardern says she will quit next month as New Zealand PM
articles.content:
"I no longer have enough in the tank" - an emotional Jacinda Ardern says she will quit next month as New Zealand PM.
